title: Website Development
summary: A comprehensive redesign for Buffalo’s oldest operating animal hospital. The new site modernizes their digital presence while honoring their century-long legacy, providing pet owners with seamless access to information on surgical, dental, and wellness care.

title: Website Development
summary: A warm, informative redesign for a patient-centered pediatric practice in Williamsville, NY. The site emphasizes their commitment to accessible care—including same-day sick visits and 24/7 physician availability—serving as a trusted digital resource for families from infancy to young adulthood.

title: Website Development
summary: A digital presence for a reliable handyman service in Buffalo, NY, offering home remodeling and repairs with a commitment to 'Honest Work at Honest Prices.' The site showcases a complete range of services from foundation to roof.

title: Website Development
summary: A straightforward, reliable website for a financial services company that acts as a partner for personal and business success. The site clearly outlines their comprehensive services, from tax preparation to business setup.
